name: Unblock Bread
description:
Now! Unblock the bread in the oven.
Brain puzzle game with various bread (Take Out Bread)
Take out one baked bread from the oven,
Raise your IQ with puzzle game!
Get hints free of charge.

Features:
For each country, there are 96 puzzles
The sequential level of difficulty.
Stars and scores are gained according to the number of moving.
The world ranking supported.
Obtain the achievements with fun!
Get one hint by getting 30 breads in unlimited mode !

Are you ready to challenge?
